io.proximax.sdk.model.transaction

Class MosaicSupplyChangeTransaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.proximax.sdk.model.transaction.Transaction
      • io.proximax.sdk.model.transaction.MosaicSupplyChangeTransaction

  • public class MosaicSupplyChangeTransaction
extends Transaction
    In case a mosaic has the flag 'supplyMutable' set to true, the creator of the mosaic can change the supply, i.e. increase or decrease the supply.

      • MosaicSupplyChangeTransaction

        public MosaicSupplyChangeTransaction(NetworkType networkType,
                                     java.lang.Integer version,
                                     TransactionDeadline deadline,
                                     java.math.BigInteger maxFee,
                                     java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> signature,
                                     java.util.Optional<PublicAccount> signer,
                                     java.util.Optional<TransactionInfo> transactionInfo,
                                     MosaicId mosaicId,
                                     MosaicSupplyType mosaicSupplyType,
                                     java.math.BigInteger delta)
        Parameters:
        networkType - network type
        version - transaction version. Use EntityVersion.MOSAIC_SUPPLY_CHANGE for current version
        deadline - transaction deadline
        maxFee - transaction fee
        signature - optional signature
        signer - optional signer
        transactionInfo - optional transaction info
        mosaicId - ID of mosaic that will change
        mosaicSupplyType - type of the supply change (increase/decrease)
        delta - the change to the supply
